thread.title: Trading Ticket, Inc. Integrates Tradier Inc. to Connect Investors to Brokerage Services
thread.title_full: Trading Ticket, Inc. Integrates Tradier Inc. to Connect Investors to Brokerage Services - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Trading Ticket, Inc. Integrates Tradier Inc. to Connect Investors to Brokerage Services
text:
Innovative trading tool TradeIt integrates with Tradier brokerage API to let mobile and webusers of financial content instantly place equity orders
CHARLOTTE, North Carolina
Brokerage API company Tradier Brokerage, Inc . today announced that mobile trading technology pioneer Trading Ticket has integrated the Tradier API into its TradeIt tool to enable users browsing content on financial media and mobile apps to place orders directly from a page or app.
“Tradier’s ability to offer seamless access to brokerage services is perfectly in line with our mission to offer flexibility to investors in today’s fast moving stock market,” said Nathan Richardson, Cofounder of Trading Ticket . “We are pleased to empower investors hungry for information with broker connectivity from any Web or mobile device.”
“TradeIt users are in the market for in-depth financial information and quick access to act on that information. We are pleased to be working with Trading Ticket to enable the seamless transition from idea to order,” said Craig Russell, Chief Evangelist and SVP of Product at Tradier, Inc. “This latest integration continues our mission of empowering fintech companies who are offering the power of choice to the modern mobile investor.”
For information on Tradier Brokerage, Inc., visit https://brokerage.tradier.com , contact us at (980) 272-3880 or engage with us on Twitter @tradier
About Tradier Brokerage Inc.
Tradier Brokerage, Inc. a member of FINRA and SIPC is an independent subsidiary of Tradier, Inc. The Brokerage API enables advisors, entrepreneurs, businesses, developers and active traders to solve their trading and brokerage challenges using the independent content and tool providers of their choice – at simple and competitive prices.
About Tradier, Inc.
Tradier, Inc. (tradier.com) is a cloud-based financial services provider and brokerage API company that offers a groundbreaking platform to serve Platform Providers, Advisors, Developers and Individual Investors. Tradier delivers an innovative set of fully hosted API's, modules and "out of the box" tools that are leveraged by a growing list of providers seeking to create innovative trading and investing experiences.
Created by developers, Tradier is a technology linchpin that works with organizations that want to democratize access to data, trade execution, low cost trading and market connectivity through cloud access. In addition, Tradier’s APIs empowers third-party developers and advisors to build applications such as algorithmic and robotic investing and trading offerings.
The Tradier solution features REST-based and Streaming APIs, and turnkey tools that deliver speed, choice and simplicity – all on a secure platform.
For information on Tradier Inc, visit http://www.Tradier.com or contact us at 980.272.3670.
